channel.title: Running Server
channel.description: Srsly I did everything rigth But server isn't on for everyone:( And i got Modem and Router Connected Together,i got deskop computer.My router type is Micronet SP916BM Also i searched for that router Tutoriol at portforward.com. There is only Micronet * SP3351 * SP3364 * SP888B * SP888C Also im very happy if someone help's me out With teamviewer If u want help me add me on msn lol rynno007@hotmail.com [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/2i2c0gz.png[/img] [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/w3fwy.png[/img] [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/hv445g.png[/img] [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/jl2t8h.png[/img]

item.title: Running Server
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

[quote=“lord ivan, post:3, topic:227269”]there is an easier way to upload your site i didnt try it until i got super sad my no-ip/port fowrding worked after i tried everything

download hamachi its mcuh easier than it seems then after uve downloaded it run it add a network on botton tab and click create name it what u want and a password thats easy like 123 or ur server name or something and then ppl join ur network by downloading hamachi adding the ip above ur comptuers name on hamachi window on the silab and joining your network by the "join network button if u want to test go on mine and message me whn u want me to turn it on if not ignore this . but anywyas mine is

network name - planetdoom

i dont have a network password so just click join[/quote]

Read full topic

download hamachi its mcuh easier than it seems then after uve downloaded it run it add a network on botton tab and click create name it what u want and a password thats easy like 123 or ur server name or something and then ppl join ur network by downloading hamachi adding the ip above ur comptuers name on hamachi window on the silab and joining your network by the "join network button if u want to test go on mine and message me whn u want me to turn it on if not ignore this . but anywyas mine is

i dont have a network password so just click join
